content: stained glass square designed by melinda miller special stitches www mocrochet blogspot com long single_crochet lsc insert hk in the designated row and work a single_crochet bringing your lp up to same height as prev sts elmore e yo insert hk from front to back into designated st and draw through yo and pull through one lp 3 lps on hk yo and draw through 2 lps 2 lps remain yo and draw through 2 lps pattern note to change color in the last stitch work the last stitch to final two loops on the hook draw up a loop with the new color and complete the stitch commence pattern with color a chain 35 row 1 place stitch marker on right side work 1 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hk 1 single_crochet into each chain to end turn 34 single_crochet should measure 10 row 2 chain 1 work 1 single_crochet into each single_crochet to end turn attach color b in last st do not finish off color a carry up side of square 34 single_crochet skill level row 3 using color b chain 3 count as 1 double_crochet skip 1st single_crochet 1 double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet *chain 2 skip 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 single_crochet 1 e finished size into each of next 2 single_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 12 square single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet repeat from * to last 6 single_crochet chain 2 skip 2 single_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet 1 materials half_double_crochet into next single_crochet 1 double_crochet into each of next 2 single_crochet worsted weight yarn turn crochet hook size h / 5 0 mm row 4 chain 3 skip 1st double_crochet work 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet tapestry needle 1 half_double_crochet into next half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet *chain 2 1 single_crochet into next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet into each stitch guide of next 2 double_crochet 1 e into each of next 2 e 1 double_crochet into single_crochet = single_crochet each of next 2 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet into double_crochet = double_crochet next single_crochet repeat from * to last 6 sts chain 2 1 single_crochet into half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet next single_crochet 1 half_double_crochet into next half_double_crochet 1 double_crochet into next double_crochet 1 lsc = long single_crochet double_crochet into 3rd of chain 3 at beg of prev row turn e = elmore attach color a in last st finish off color b row 5 using color a chain 1 work 1 single_crochet into each of first 4 sts inserting hk from front of work work 1 lsc into each of the 2 free single_crochet in a 3 row below *1 single_crochet into each of the next 10 sts on prev row work 2 lsc 3 row below as before repeat from * to
